de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database

Class DbDataObjectInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbObject
      • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbDataObjectInstance

  • public class DbDataObjectInstance
extends DbObject
    This class is the representation of a dataObject instance in the database. It provides the functionality to check for existing instances or create new ones. Moreover you can get the state of the dataObject instance as well as prevent concurrent modifying of the same instance.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DbDataObjectInstance()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This method creates and saves a dataObject instance to the database and saves a log entry into the database.
      java.lang.Boolean existDataObjectInstance(int scenarioInstance_id, int dataObject_id)
      This method checks if the instance of a dataObject is existing.
      int getDataObjectID(int dataObjectInstanceID)
      This method returns the dataobject_id of a dataObjectInstance.
      int getDataObjectInstanceID(int scenarioInstance_id, int dataObject_id)
      This method returns the dataObject instance ID of a corresponding dataObject.
      boolean getOnChange(int dataObjectInstance_id)
      This method checks if the dataObject instance is in a modified state to prevent concurrency.
      int getStateID(int dataObjectInstance_id)
      This method returns the state ID of a given dataObject instance.
      void setOnChange(int id, java.lang.Boolean onChange)
      This method sets the dataObject instance to a modified state so that no other activity can work with it.
      void setState(int id, int state)
      This method sets the state of a dataObject instance to a desirable one and saves a log entry into the database.

    • Method Detail

      • existDataObjectInstance

        public java.lang.Boolean existDataObjectInstance(int scenarioInstance_id,
                                        int dataObject_id)
        This method checks if the instance of a dataObject is existing.
        Parameters:
        scenarioInstance_id - This is the database ID of a scenario instance.
        dataObject_id - This is the database ID of a dataObject.
        Returns:
        true if DataObject is existing else false.

      • setState

        public void setState(int id,
            int state)
        This method sets the state of a dataObject instance to a desirable one and saves a log entry into the database.
        Parameters:
        id - This is the database ID of a dataObject instance.
        state - This is the desirable state of a dataObject instance.

      • createNewDataObjectInstance

        public int createNewDataObjectInstance(int scenarioInstance_id,
                              int state_id,
                              int dataObject_id)
        This method creates and saves a dataObject instance to the database and saves a log entry into the database.
        Parameters:
        scenarioInstance_id - This is the database ID of a scenario instance.
        state_id - This is the initial state of a dataObject instance.
        dataObject_id - This is the database ID of a dataObject.
        Returns:
        -1 if something went wrong else return the database ID of the newly created dataObject instance.

      • getDataObjectInstanceID

        public int getDataObjectInstanceID(int scenarioInstance_id,
                          int dataObject_id)
        This method returns the dataObject instance ID of a corresponding dataObject.
        Parameters:
        scenarioInstance_id - This is the database ID of a scenario instance.
        dataObject_id - This is the database ID of a dataObject.
        Returns:
        -1 if something went wrong else the database ID of a dataObject instance.

      • getStateID

        public int getStateID(int dataObjectInstance_id)
        This method returns the state ID of a given dataObject instance.
        Parameters:
        dataObjectInstance_id - This is the database ID of a dataObject instance.
        Returns:
        -1 if something went wrong else the database ID of the state of the dataObject instance.

      • getOnChange

        public boolean getOnChange(int dataObjectInstance_id)
        This method checks if the dataObject instance is in a modified state to prevent concurrency.
        Parameters:
        dataObjectInstance_id - This is the database ID of a dataObject instance.
        Returns:
        true if another activity is using this dataObject instance else false.

      • setOnChange

        public void setOnChange(int id,
               java.lang.Boolean onChange)
        This method sets the dataObject instance to a modified state so that no other activity can work with it.
        Parameters:
        id - This is the database ID of a dataObject instance.
        onChange - This is the flag set to indicate if the dataObject instance is being modified or not.

      • getDataObjectID

        public int getDataObjectID(int dataObjectInstanceID)
        This method returns the dataobject_id of a dataObjectInstance.
        Parameters:
        dataObjectInstanceID - Id of the dataIbjectInstance.
        Returns:
        Dataobject_id.
